column9: I took 80mg Lipitor once a day for 6 months and then the doctor reduced it to 40mg.  At around 4 month into taking Lipitor muscle pain developed in my calves.  It is difficult to go down stairs, and my calves ache most of the time.  A month ago, started taking 300mg CoQ10 daily (after reading that it is a good supplement for people to take who experience muscle pain from statin drugs) and the muscle pain is less than it was but still uncomfortable at times.  I'm hoping that the longer I take the C0Q10, the less pain I experience.  I
